World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 12 日星期五 04:05:54 GMT 120
Anti-war activists in New York City, Washington protest U.S., UK strikes in YemenA few dozen anti-war activists gathered at Times Square in New York City and outside the White House late on Thursday to protest U.S. and British strikes against Houthi military targets in Yemen, saying the step threatened to widen the war in Gaza. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 03:53:07 GMT O6CWCGZOWBOBBOO2BXEA72B5EA https://www.reuters.com/world/anti-war-activists-new-york-city-washington-protest-us-uk-strikes-yemen-2024-01-12/Kanishka Singh世界
Australia says it provided personnel support for US, UK strikes in YemenAustralia provided personnel support to the U.S. and UK in their strikes against Houthi military targets in Yemen, Defence Minister Richard Marles said on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 03:04:10 GMT BE4Y4N3VNVP77KBMXOLVWHVFVE https://www.reuters.com/world/australia-says-it-provided-personnel-support-us-uk-strikes-yemen-2024-01-12/Reuters世界
Blinken to meet senior Chinese official ahead of Taiwan electionsU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will meet senior Chinese official Liu Jianchao in Washington on Friday, the State Department said in his official schedule, the talks coming just a day ahead of elections in Taiwan that will test efforts to ease U.S.-China tensions. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:30:08 GMT UGZZ2HWD4RNXXHPQRCTCR5QGUY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/blinking-meet-senior-chinese-official-ahead-taiwan-elections-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
Saudi Arabia calls for restraint after air strikes on YemenSaudi Arabia called for restraint and "avoiding escalation" in light of the air strikes launched by the United States and Britain against sites linked to the Houthi movement in Yemen, the kingdom's foreign ministry said on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:27:11 GMT OKZRQTVRXJUNBP4TMSK4WB6M4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/saudi-arabia-calls-for-restraint-after-air-strikes-yemen-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中东地区
Taiwan says it spotted more Chinese balloons over strait, a day ahead of voteTaiwan's defence ministry said on Friday it detected five Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait over the past 24 hours, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:17:56 GMT QY3OI3K4AROYPGO5ORXEEVR23M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-says-it-spotted-more-chinese-balloons-over-straight-day-ahead-vote-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
North Korea poised to admit first known tourists since 2020A group from Russia is poised to be the first known tourists allowed into North Korea since anti-pandemic border lockdowns began in early 2020, according to a post from Russian provincial authorities and a Western tour guide. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 01:09:45 GMT 2DPN7BKIJZLYFGHS5PASE2IH5M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-poished-admit-first-known-tourists-since-2020-2024-01-12/Josh Smith世界亚太地区
Reactions to US, British strikes against Houthis in YemenThe United States and Britain launched a series of strikes on Yemen on Thursday aimed at the Iran-backed Houthi militia that started targeting international shipping in the Red Sea late last year. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 00:47:46 GMT ERECBDG5KJMYTFRVC3KFCNSB5I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/reactions-us-british-strikes-against-houthis-yemen-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中东地区
Quiet streets, fuel lines follow declaration of emergency in Papua New GuineaSoldiers and police patrolled the quiet streets of Port Moresby on Friday morning as people joined long lines for fuel a day after Papua New Guinea declared a state of emergency in response to a massive outbreak of rioting and violence. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 00:30:25 GMT TKS4QX4RFRPY5HARYB5UUZWPN4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/quiet-streets-fuel-lines-follow-declaration-of-emergency-papua-new-guinea-2024-01-12/Lewis Jackson世界美洲
US, Britain carry out strikes against Houthis in Yemen, officials sayThe United States and Britain launched strikes from the air and sea against Houthi military targets in Yemen in response to the movement's attacks on ships in the Red Sea, a dramatic regional widening of the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 23:40:48 GMT 6QYAAUVYXBLHRGBGHNKJCSLPXY https://www.reuters.com/world/us-britain-carry-out-strikes-against-yemen-houthis-officials-2024-01-11/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali, Mohammed Ghobari世界
US imposes sanctions over transfer of North Korean ballistic missiles to RussiaThe U.S. State Department on Thursday imposed sanctions on three Russian entities and one individual involved in the transfer and testing of North Korea's ballistic missiles for Russia's use against Ukraine, Secretary of State Antony Blinken said. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 22:42:17 GMT XQPVN27IQNNODCMDUB7DBGGRW4 https://www.reuters.com/world/us-imposes-sanctions-over-transfer-north-korean-ballistic-missiles-Russia-2024-01-11/Kanishka Singh世界
Who are Denmark's royal power couple, about to be throned king and queen?Denmark's soon-to-be king and queen have sought to balance their royal jobs with a modern family life and an engagement in progressive causes, helping keep the monarchy relevant and popular in the Nordic country. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 20:49:14 GMT CKAJXGZT5JKQNHD6YIEHTKT7I4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/who-are-the-royal-power- Couple-of-denmark-about-to-be-thrown-king-queen-2024-01-11/Jacob Gronholt-Pedersen世界欧洲
